name: Claimbeer
description:
Claimbeer is a small metroidvania where you start in a dark room. You was drunken and got here in this dark cave but you don’t know how you cam in here. You must get out of this cave.

You can collect your items and unlock abilities and things.

  • Candle: Enlight the world
  • Jump Boots: You can Jump now (with Space)
  • Arrow: You can shoot arrows with X
  • Dash: You can now dash with C
